verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7133><s%>, My oblation, my food for my offerings <S%H7133><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto me <S%H8104><s%>, shall ye observe to offer <S%H7126><s%> unto me in their due season <S%H4150><s%>.

And thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H801><s%>, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> day by day <S%H3117><s%>, for a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>.

The one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> shalt thou offer <S%H6213><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> shalt thou offer <S%H6213><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>;

and the tenth <S%H6224><s%> part of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, mingled <S%H1101><s%> with the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of beaten <S%H3795><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>.

It is a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, which was ordained <S%H6213><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And the drink-offering <S%H5262><s%> thereof shall be the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of a hin <S%H1969><s%> for the one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%>: in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place shalt thou pour <S%H5258><s%> out a drink-offering <S%H5262><s%> of strong drink <S%H7941><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> shalt thou offer <S%H6213><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>: as the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> of the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and as the drink-offering <S%H4503><s%> thereof <S%H6213><s%>, thou shalt offer it <S%H801><s%>, an offering made by fire, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> parts of an ephah of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and the drink-offering <S%H5262><s%> thereof:
this is the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> of every sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and the drink-offering <S%H5930><s%> thereof.

And in the beginnings <S%H7218><s%> of your months <S%H2320><s%> ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%>;

and three <S%H7969><s%> tenth parts of an ephah <S%H6241><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, for each <S%H259><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>; and two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> parts of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, for the one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>;

and a tenth part <S%H6241><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%> for a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> unto every <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%>; for a burnt-offering <S%H4503><s%> of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And their drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%> shall be half <S%H2677><s%> a hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%> for a bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and the third <S%H7992><s%> part of a hin <S%H1969><s%> for the ram <S%H352><s%>, and the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of a hin <S%H1969><s%> for a lamb <S%H3532><s%>: this is the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> of every month <S%H2320><s%> throughout the months <S%H2320><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%>.

And one <S%H259><s%> he <S%H8163><s%> - goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; it shall be offered <S%H6213><s%> besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and the drink-offering <S%H5930><s%> thereof.
And in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%>, is Jehovah <S%H6453><s%>'s passover.

And on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this month <S%H2320><s%> shall be a feast <S%H2282><s%>: seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> be eaten <S%H398><s%>.
In the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>: ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>;

but ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, and seven <S%H7651><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H8549><s%>; they shall be unto you without blemish;

and their meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>: three <S%H7969><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> shall ye offer <S%H6213><s%> for a bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for the ram <S%H352><s%>;
a tenth part <S%H6241><s%> shalt thou offer <S%H6213><s%> for every <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%>;
and one <S%H259><s%> he-goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, to make atonement for you <S%H3722><s%>.
Ye shall offer <S%H6213><s%> these besides the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> of the morning <S%H1242><s%>, which is for a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>.

After this manner ye shall offer <S%H6213><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%>, for seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, the food <S%H3899><s%> of the offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: it shall be offered <S%H6213><s%> besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and the drink-offering <S%H5930><s%> thereof.
And on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> ye shall have a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>: ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>.

Also in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the first-fruits <S%H1061><s%>, when ye offer <S%H7126><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in your feast of weeks <S%H7620><s%>, ye shall have a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>; ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>;

but ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year old <S%H8141><s%>;

and their meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for each <S%H259><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for the one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>,
a tenth part <S%H6241><s%> for every <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%>;
one <S%H259><s%> he-goat <S%H5795><s%>, to make atonement for you <S%H3722><s%>.

Besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> thereof <S%H6213><s%>, ye shall offer them <S%H8549><s%> (they shall be unto you without blemish), and their drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%>.
